topics.body:
Okay. I'm gonna preface this. I hate Naruto. I used to like it, then it started sucking, and now I hate it. It's awful. The story has lost it's fucking mind, and Sasuke still lives. It is one the worst manga ever written in history. That being said.
[spoiler]!http://v103.violet.fastwebserver.de/series/Naruto/0682-007.png![/spoiler]
I haven't laughed THIS HARD at a panel in Naruto in a damned long time.
